data.eml:eml: First description of the male of Yaobinthrips yangtzei (Thysanoptera: Thripidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xie, Yong-Hui, Zhang, Hongrui (2016): First description of the male of Yaobinthrips yangtzei (Thysanoptera: Thripidae). Zootaxa 4066 (1): 83-84, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4066.1.8
